text: "When a Man Loves a Woman" is a 1966 R&B; song by Percy Sledge. The song hit #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart. It also was #1 on the R&B; singles chart. The song was later performed by Michael Bolton in 1991. His version won a Grammy Award.
